title: Brand new Pixel 3 has vertical green line running the length of the screen
content:
I have a vertical green line running the length of my brand new Pixel 3 phone. I just took it out of the box and hadn't even started the device setup when it appeared. I rebooted the phone a few times and it went away temporarily, but it came back after I did the initial device setup.

Model: Pixel 3
Hardware version: MP1.0
